text: John James Stewart Farmer (born 5 August 1934) is an English former first- class cricketer. Farmer was born at Leatherhead in August 1934. He was educated at Eton College, before going up to Christ Church, Oxford. While studying at Oxford, he made two appearances in first-class cricket for Oxford University against Gloucestershire and Lancashire at Oxford in 1958, scoring 10 runs. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:People from Leatherhead Category:People educated at Eton College Category:Alumni of Christ Church, Oxford Category:English cricketers Category:Oxford University cricketers
title: John Farmer (cricketer)
